definition: brisket/belly beef/spongy meat from cow's underside and neighboring ribs/see 牛腩[niu2 nan3] esp. Cantonese/erroneously translated as sirloin
brisket (esp. Cantonese)/belly beef/spongy meat from cow's underside and neighboring ribs/erroneously translated as sirloin
meaty flesh from the underbelly of the carp

sentences.english: Blanch the pork belly and then rinse.
sentences.chinese: 五花腩汆水，然后用水清洗。

sentences.english: Kumamoto oyster, Fine Claire oyster, chu-toro, tuna & salmon sashimi.
sentences.chinese: 日本熊本生蚝，法国芬得克雷尔生蚝，金枪鱼腩。

sentences.english: Lastly bring sauce and spareribs to the boil reducing sauce by half. Serve hot with vegetable rice.
sentences.chinese: 最后把糖醋汁及腩排煮至浓稠，与菜饭同吃。

sentences.english: Rinse pork belly, rub skin with dark soya sauce, sear skin until brown.
sentences.chinese: 五花腩原件冲净，用老抽搽抹猪皮，用白镬爆至啡色。

sentences.english: Slice pork thinly and arrange on a plate with cucumber by the side.
sentences.chinese: 将五花腩切成薄片，排放碟内，以青瓜伴边。

sentences.english: Freeze the pork belly in the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 把煮好的五花腩放在雪柜冷冻。

sentences.english: Put the sauted glutinous rice and chopped pork belly into a teacup.
sentences.chinese: 把已炒的糯米和切件的五花腩放入茶杯中。

sentences.english: Add pork belly and wine, simmer for 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 将腩肉放下汁内，加绍酒，改用中慢火炆45分钟。

definition: brisket (esp. Cantonese)/belly beef/spongy meat from cow's underside and neighboring ribs/erroneously translated as sirloin
to stew in soy sauce and spices
fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
